ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Warning: Undefined variable $morehtmlright - Loan Module
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Version: 20.0.2 Hello, I see a warning when I display the Notes of a loan that I have previously created ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/81ee8941-d5dc-4eac-8e53-d17034a94a31) The code at line 133 and 134 is ``` $morehtmlstatus = $morehtmlright; dol_banner_tab($object, 'id', $linkback, 1, 'rowid', 'ref', $morehtmlref, '', 0, '', $morehtmlstatus); ``` I don't know what is $morehtmlright In other modules I see `dol_banner_tab($object, 'id', $linkback, 1, 'rowid', 'ref', $morehtmlref);` ### Dolibarr Version 20.0.2 ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: FIX Loan - Undefined variable #31973 & #31974 (#31977) Co-authored-by: Laurent Destailleur <eldy@destailleur.fr>
